_meanings:
{@--1@} Awaking(<ab>fig.</ab> also), 

awakening; regaining one's 
consciousness, consciousness; {#apraboDAya suzvApa#}
<ls>R. 12. 50</ls>; {#mohAdBUtkazwataraH praboDaH#} <ls n="R.">14. 56.</ls>

{@--5@}
Knowledge, understanding, wisdom,
removal of delusion, real 
knowledge; as in {#praboDacaMdrodaya#}; <ls>R. 5. 65.</ls>

{@--7@} Reviving the
fragrance of a perfume.

<ab>N.</ab> of a 
festival observed from the tenth to
the day of full-moon in the month
of Kārtika.
